00383                                 public Drawable drawableFromUrl(String url) throws IOException {
00384                                         Bitmap x;
00385 
00386                                         HttpURLConnection connection = (HttpURLConnection) new URL(
00387                                                         url).openConnection();
00388                                         connection.connect();
00389                                         InputStream input = connection.getInputStream();
00390 
00391                                         x = BitmapFactory.decodeStream(input);
00392                                         return new BitmapDrawable(x);
00393                                 }
00394                         });
00395 
00396                 }
